artist: Publisher: Pierre Mariette Le Fils; Engraver: Jean Lepautre
description: landscape with column at left; 3 men in front of column; 3 women with child and dog at right of column; river right and center of image; shepherd and cows on river bank; small boat in distance crossing river; 3 figures waiting on shore; enclosed in an elaborate frame with vines around, shell at center bottom and face at center top
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

below image in black: P. Mariette ex  le Potre fecit. |  in pencil on sheet: 2-22
title: None
